    title = {Light color acclimation is a key process in the global ocean distribution of Synechococcus cyanobacteria},
    journal = {Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences},
    year = {2018},

    doi = {10.1073/pnas.201717069},

}

    title = {Differential acclimation kinetics of the two forms of type IV chromatic acclimaters occurring in marine Synechococcus cyanobacteria},
